group_1.textRight: Hmph.@As long as you've clued in, we're all good.

group_1.textLeft: I can't go together with you, after all.

group_1.textRight: Huh?@Did you not listen to a word I said?
Even if you do find something valuable, you'll just@run away.
The more valuable things you find, the more you'll@lose and regret.
And above all else! @The thing you need to look for doesn't even...!

group_1.textLeft: ...You're right.@You're completely right...
Losing things is scary.@I run away from them on my own.
I don't know what I want.
But, even still...!@I don't want to give up from the start...
Maybe, I won't ever find the answer for the rest of@my life, and
I may never find another place I feel like I belong.
But if that's the case,
then I feel like it's all the more reason to cherish@what I already have...
So I have to accept this uneasiness that eats at me.
And I'll search a little further.@For who I am, that is...

group_1.textRight: ...You DO know what you're saying, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.@At least, I'm pretty sure I do.
Plus, everything will be gone one day.
People's lives, their connections--@they all end at some point...
I'm sure it's unavoidable.@Especially for Magical Girls like us...
...Because of that, we should value all the important people who are already within reach.
So what I can do right now...
is to cherish all of them.@To not lose sight of them.
I understand what you were trying to tell me.@Thank you.
Instead of grieving over what we'll lose one day,@let's cherish what we have now.
Let's protect it.@That's what I'm thinking... what about you?

group_1.textRight: ...That's impossible for you.@You'll definitely be back here again someday.
You'll absolutely repeat the same mistakes.
Well, I know you'll be here anyway, so I guess I can@wait a little longer.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*@You're a good person.

group_1.textRight: Ha!@What are you saying!
I'm just waiting for you to mature, it's not for@your sake.
Go on, hurry and get out of here, stubborn fool.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, goodbye.

group_1.textRight: Shizuku's awake!!

group_1.textLeft: Eh...@what...

group_1.textRight: Don't "what" me!
You, you...@ginormous dummy!
Really!@Everyone has been so worried about you!

group_1.textLeft: Umm...

group_1.textRight: On top of how you never replied...
After a certain point, I couldn't even reach your@phone.
Even I was worried to the bone...

group_1.textLeft: (That's right, I...)

group_1.textRight: It's a good thing that your Doppel emerged where@it did.

group_1.textLeft: Mitama...

group_1.textRight: When Kanagi contacted me I was surprised.
She said you were wandering around with your@Soul Gem pitch black!

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm really sorry for worrying you...

group_1.textRight: Really...
Ah, also Kanagi had a message for you.

group_1.narration: Hozumi, you have many friends.@If you're having a hard time,@I'm sure you can rely on them.
I think that's the sort of thing that@will help clear away your troubles.
I don't mind if you consider me@to be one of those friends, either.@As someone in the same profession,@I hope to continue seeing you around.

group_1.textLeft: Profession...?

group_1.textRight: Kanagi also works in a maid cafe.
Which makes her a fellow cafe worker...
Though I'm not really sure if it counts as@"the same profession".
The next time you visit her cafe, she said she@would give you a discount.
Oh what a terrible sneeze that was.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...
Someone must be spreading rumors about me.

group_1.textRight: They say that if you only sneeze once, it must be@a good rumor!

group_1.textLeft: Oh... is that so.@That makes me happy.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*@Well today you should be resting...
Ah!!!!!! Shizuku!@We're going home!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: No, she needs to rest!
It's alriiight it's alriiight!

group_1.textLeft: Uhhhh, sorry to run out on ya!

group_1.textRight: Mitama!@Sorry!
